description: False indigo (Baptisia variicolor ‘Twilite’ TWILITE PRAIRIEBLUES) is an amazing plant species. Its unique flower spike style blooms and electric blue foliage boast natural beauty. Its blooms start bright yellow in spring, changing to a bright turquoise by summer, making it a perfect choice for those who want to add colour and life to their garden. Its drought-tolerant nature makes it a great addition for a xeriscape garden and the fact that it does not require much maintenance only adds to its appeal. It can also attract hummingbirds, adding some sound to the gorgeous visuals.
